header.title: phpBB Garage 2.0.0
header.description: This mod allows users of your forum to add details about their vehicles.
header.author-notes: - This Mod Was Inspired By IPB Based Garage By Matthew C. Veno

action-group.diy-instructions: Chmod ./garage/ to 755 Chmod ./garage/upload to 777 Open your web browser and run install_garage.php Delete install_garage.php if it ran succesfully

edit.find: 'SELECT' => 'u.user_id, u.group_id as default_group, u.username, u.username_clean, u.user_colour, u.user_rank, u.user_posts, u.user_allow_pm, g.group_id, g.group_name, g.group_colour, g.group_type, ug.user_id as ug_user_id',

inline-edit.inline-action: , g.id as garage_id, CONCAT_WS(' ', g.made_year, makes.make, models.model) AS vehicle

edit.action: ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_VEHICLES_TABLE => 'g'), 'ON' => 'g.user_id = p.poster_id and g.main_vehicle = 1' ) ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_MAKES_TABLE => 'makes'), 'ON' => 'g.make_id = makes.id and makes.pending = 0' ) ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_MODELS_TABLE => 'models'), 'ON' => 'g.model_id = models.id and models.pending = 0' )

//-- mod start : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //-- add 'MCP_GARAGE' => 'Garage', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_VEHICLES' => 'Vehicles awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_GUESTBOOK_COMMENTS' => 'Comments awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_MAKES' => 'Makes awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_MODELS' => 'Models awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_BUSINESS' => 'Business's awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_QUARTERMILES' => '¼ miles awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_DYNORUNS' => 'Dynoruns awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_LAPS' => 'Laps awaiting approval', 'MCP_GARAGE_UNAPPROVED_TRACKS' => 'Tracks awaiting approval', //-- mod finish : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//-- mod start : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //-- add 'ACP_GARAGE' => 'Garage', 'ACP_GARAGE_BUSINESS' => 'Business's', 'ACP_GARAGE_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage business management', 'ACP_GARAGE_CATEGORIES' => 'Categories', 'ACP_GARAGE_CATEGORY_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage category management', 'ACP_GARAGE_MODELS' => 'Makes/models', 'ACP_GARAGE_MODEL_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage make/model managment', 'ACP_GARAGE_PRODUCTS' => 'Products', 'ACP_GARAGE_PRODUCT_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage modification managment', 'ACP_GARAGE_QUOTAS' => 'Quotas', 'ACP_GARAGE_QUOTA_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage quotas', 'ACP_GARAGE_TOOLS' => 'Tools', 'ACP_GARAGE_TOOL_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage Tools', 'ACP_GARAGE_TRACK' => 'Tracks', 'ACP_GARAGE_TRACK_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage track managment', 'ACP_GARAGE_SETTINGS' => 'Garage settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_MANAGEMENT' => 'Garage management', 'ACP_GARAGE_GENERAL_SETTINGS' => 'General settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_MENU_SETTINGS' => 'Menu settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_INDEX_SETTINGS' => 'Index page settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_IMAGES_SETTINGS' => 'Image settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_QUARTERMILE_SETTINGS' => '¼ mile settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_DYNORUN_SETTINGS' => 'Dynorun settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_TRACK_SETTINGS' => 'Track/lap settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_INSURANCE_SETTINGS' => 'Insurance settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_BUSINESS_SETTINGS' => 'Business settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_RATING_SETTINGS' => 'Rating settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_GUESTBOOK_SETTINGS' => 'Guestbook settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_PRODUCT_SETTINGS' => 'Product settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_SERVICE_SETTINGS' => 'Service history settings', 'ACP_GARAGE_BLOG_SETTINGS' => 'Blog settings', 'APPROVE' => 'Approve', 'DISAPPROVE' => 'Disapprove', //-- mod finish : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//-- mod start : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //-- add 'IMG_CAT_GARAGE' => 'phpBB Garage images', 'IMG_GARAGE_VEHICLE_IMG_ATTACHED'=> 'Vehicle with image', 'IMG_GARAGE_SLIP_IMG_ATTACHED' => 'Slip with image', 'IMG_GARAGE_ICON_GARAGE' => 'Garage icon', 'IMG_GARAGE_MAIN_MENU' => 'Index menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_BROWSE' => 'Browse menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_SEARCH' => 'Search menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_QUARTERMILE_TABLE' => '¼ mile table', 'IMG_GARAGE_DYNORUN_TABLE' => 'Dynorun table', 'IMG_GARAGE_LAP_TABLE' => 'Lap table', 'IMG_GARAGE_GARAGE_REVIEW' => 'Garage review', 'IMG_GARAGE_SHOP_REVIEW' => 'Shop review', 'IMG_GARAGE_INSURANCE_REVIEW' => 'Insurance review', 'IMG_GARAGE_CREATE_VEHICLE' => 'Create vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_EDIT_VEHICLE' => 'Edit vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_DELETE_VEHICLE' => 'Delete vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_VIEW_VEHICLE' => 'View vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_MODIFICATION' => 'Add modification', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_INSURANCE' => 'Add insurance', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_DYNORUN' => 'Add dynorun', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_LAP' => 'Add lap', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_SERVICE' => 'Add service', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_QUARTERMILE' => 'Add ¼ mile', 'IMG_GARAGE_MANAGE_GALLERY' => 'Manage vehicle gallery', 'IMG_GARAGE_EDIT' => 'Edit', 'IMG_GARAGE_DELETE' => 'Delete', 'IMG_GARAGE_MAIN_VEHICLE' => 'Main vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_NO_THUMB' => 'No thumb', 'IMG_GARAGE_SHOW_DETAILS' => 'Show details', 'IMG_GARAGE_HIDE_DETAILS' => 'Hide details', 'IMG_GARAGE_MOVE_UP' => 'Move up', 'IMG_GARAGE_MOVE_DOWN' => 'Move down', 'IMG_GARAGE_SET_APPROVED' => 'Approve', 'IMG_GARAGE_SET_PENDING' => 'Pending', //-- mod finish : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
